name: My Winter Album
description:
"Grandma’s favorite winter album, full of memories broke into pieces, and only you, her favorite grandson, can help her put the pieces back together."

My Winter Album was created during the Buildbox Game Jam, this December and won the first place. A relaxing puzzle game, in which players have to rotate the shattered pieces until they recreate the entire object. 

Features:

  • 24 winter-related memories to assemble.
  • Relaxing puzzles, time pressure-free.
  • Beautiful pixel 3d artwork.
  • Simple controls.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

"My Winter Album" in the news:

  • "Fun little perspective puzzler" - PocketGamer
  • "Best games of the week | December 2019" - Appadvice
  • "A perfectly charming Holiday time waster" - TapSmart
  • "Definitely worth playing if you enjoy a good story and challenging puzzles." - Android Police
  • First Place Winner in the Buildbox Game Jam

Controls:

  • Q to quit from Main Menu
  • Left Mouse Button (Click & Drag) to rotate the shattered pieces.
